citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
***All three of the capuchin enclosures have excess accumulation of waste material on the floor. The blankets, toys, and
swings have become soiled with food waste and feces. The licensee states that he has been unable to clean due to
illness and the enclosures were last fully cleaned 4 days ago. Excessive accumulations of feces and waste materials may
allow the capuchins and food provided to them to become contaminated increasing the risk of illness.
Excreta and food waste must be removed from inside each indoor primary enclosure daily and from underneath them as
often as necessary to prevent an excessive accumulation of feces and food waste, to prevent the nonhuman primates
from becoming soiled, and to reduce disease hazards, insects, pests, and odors.
Correct by November 1, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Owner.
n

narrative:
3.84(a) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
***All three of the capuchin enclosures have excess accumulation of waste material on the floor. The blankets, toys, and 
swings have become soiled with food waste and feces. The licensee states that he has been unable to clean due to 
illness and the enclosures were last fully cleaned 4 days ago. Excessive accumulations of feces and waste materials may 
allow the capuchins and food provided to them to become contaminated increasing the risk of illness. 
 
Excreta and food waste must be removed from inside each indoor primary enclosure daily and from underneath them as 
often as necessary to prevent an excessive accumulation of feces and food waste, to prevent the nonhuman primates 
from becoming soiled, and to reduce disease hazards, insects, pests, and odors. 
 
Correct by November 1, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Owner.
